chart_description: The I/O full pressure chart measures the percentage of time the disk is busy with requests, showing how much load is being placed on the disk subsystem. A high value here could indicate a bottleneck in your I/O system.

dimension_descriptions.full 10: This dimension shows the percentage of time the disk was fully utilized over the last 10 seconds.
dimension_descriptions.full 300: This dimension shows the percentage of time the disk was fully utilized over the last 5 minutes.
dimension_descriptions.full 60: This dimension shows the percentage of time the disk was fully utilized over the last minute.
